items.content_html: General scripts, snippets, and tools. Files are meant to be lightweight, and able to be used with minimal customizations (if any).

items.content_html: TypeNexus is a great tool for API encapsulation and management. It offers a clean and lightweight way to bundle TypeORM + Expressjs functionality, helping you to build applications faster while reducing template code redundancy and type conversion work.
items.title: jaywcjlove/typenexus: TypeNexus is a great tool for API encapsulation and management. It offers a clean and lightweight way to bundle TypeORM + Expressjs functionality, helping you to build applications faster while reducing template code redundancy and type conversion work.

items.content_html: Lightweight typescript library for cross-chain wallets. Connect with multiple blockchains via a common interface, with support for the minimum features necessary.
items.title: xchainjs/xchainjs-lib: Lightweight typescript library for cross-chain wallets. Connect with multiple blockchains via a common interface, with support for the minimum features necessary.

items.content_html: Quell is an easy-to-use, lightweight JavaScript library providing a client- and server-side caching solution for GraphQL. Use Quell to prevent redundant client-side API requests and to minimize costly server-side response latency.
items.title: open-source-labs/Quell: Quell is an easy-to-use, lightweight JavaScript library providing a client- and server-side caching solution for GraphQL. Use Quell to prevent redundant client-side API requests and to minimize costly server-side response latency.
